projects.title: BluesPrompter
projects.description: Concieved as a DIY alternative to products like the Stageprompter, BluesPrompter is a stand-alone app that displays lyrics and chords, song structures or presentation notes on a floor-standing monitor, all easily controlled by footswitch for a relaxed and confident stage experience for performers everywhere.

projects.title: bluesjab.de
projects.description: Website for my my band, Blues Jab

projects.title: 30-Day Streak
projects.technologies: React | Sass | Bootstrap | JavaScript | NodeJS | ExpressJS | MongoDB
projects.description:
Track and form new habits over 30 days!
Users can select or create challenges and prizes for successful progress.

Created with Ania Waszak and Katie Gracey.

projects.title: Musician's website
projects.type: Concept for a musician's website with CMS
projects.technologies: HTML | CSS | JavaScript | NodeJS | ExpressJS | Handlebars | MongoDB
projects.description:
Demo website incorporating a simple webshop, secure webmaster login and Content Management System using MongoDB.

Created with William Campbell.

projects.title: (Not so) Super-hero Memory
projects.type: Classic memory game with a twist
projects.description:
Gather your team of (not so) super-heroes to save the world, but watch out!
They don't sit still for long and someone's left dangerous piles of kryptonite lying around - pick a pair and you're toast!!
